Title: Raises the maximum fine for persons who violate the law regulating telemarketing to twenty thousand dollars
Summary: Raises the maximum fine for persons who violate the law regulating telemarketing to twenty thousand dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to raising the maximum fine for persons who violate the law regulating telemarketing
